albums.title: Schwifty
albums.description: Rick and morty must aid Earth after a giant head disrupts the planet, demanding to see a hit song performed.

albums.title: Lumberjack
albums.description: A song that will get you out hiking in the woods

albums.title: Shaolin Kung Fu Hao Yeah
albums.description: Absolutely the best martial arts film ever, this song is performed by Stephen Chow and Wong Yat-fei

albums.title: D.I.S.C.O.
albums.description: Uriel Yekutiel is a Trans-Continental celebrity in the club scene. Uriel has a growing popularity on Youtube through video promotions for Israeli club night party Arisa.

albums.title: The GOOD TIMES
albums.description: Joseph Edgar Foreman (born July 28, 1974), better known by his stage name Afroman, is an American rapper and musician. He is best known for the hit single "Because I Got High". He was nominated for a Grammy award in 2002.
